feed.title: Let’s Talk About It
feed.subtitle: Let's Talk About It is a wide ranging sports podcast with a sprinkle of pop culture thrown into the mix. Join Max Adams and his fellow insiders as they cover the national sports and trending entertainment news world and its headlines through their lenses. Your next favorite sports personalities are here, why don't we talk about it?

entry.title: Let’s Talk About It: The Premiere Special - Season 1 Episode 1

link.title: Let’s Talk About It: The Premiere Special - Season 1 Episode 1

entry.content:
In the series premiere of Let’s Talk About It, Max Adams and his panel of insiders introduce themselves to the sports world covering the latest in the NBA and the Finals, Amanda Nunes’s retirement, trying to figure out what is wrong with the New York Mets, and much, much more. Tune in to the 3 hour premiere special of your next favorite sports podcast.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/letstalkpodhtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

Tune in to the 3 hour premiere special of your next favorite sports podcast.
